alert.note: Alert for Collin; Dallas; Ellis; Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 14 at 5:58PM CDT until March 14 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rockwall County in north central Texas... Southwestern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northern Kaufman County in north central Texas... North central Ellis County in north central Texas... Southeastern Collin County in north central Texas... Eastern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ferris, or 8 miles south of Seagoville, moving northeast at 30 mph. A second storm is located north of Mesquite and south of Garland moving northeast. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Garland, Mesquite, Richardson, Rowlett, Wylie, Rockwall, Balch Springs, Sachse, Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Kaufman, Murphy, Royse City, Heath, Fate, Sunnyvale, Crandall and Combine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 477 and 511. Interstate 30 between mile markers 55 and 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Collin; Dallas; Ellis; Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall
